DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate effect vitamin D supplementation insulin sensitivity pancreatic islet beta-cell function . Our hypothesis vitamin D supplementation normal level patient impair fast glucose result improve insulin sensitivity improve beta cell function .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin D Deficiency Vitamin D Supplementation Glucose Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: A modify frequently sample intravenous glucose tolerance ( mFSIGT ) test use . On day 0 , baseline 22 time point mFSIGT perform . Subjects treat cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) supplementation - 10,000 IU/day - 28 consecutive day . mFSIGT repeat measure glucose , insulin c-peptide time point . 25-OH vitamin D , PTH , calcium also measure time point 0 pre post vitamin D supplementation . Data analyze use Bergman/Boston minimal model insulin homeostasis MinMod Millennium software .
DOC.criteria: Impaired fast glucose Adult , age 18 65 Serum vitamin D level 30 ng/mL History nephrolithiasis Any medication effect insulin sensitivity beta cell function ( i.e . antipsychotic , metformin ) Pregnancy Liver disease Renal disease
DOC.keyword: modify frequently sample IV glucose tolerance test
